import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import {useForm} from "react-hook-form" import "./singin.css" function Singin(){ const {register, handleSubmit, formState: {errors}} = useForm() const onSubmit = (data) =>{ alert(JSON.stringify(data)) } return (

Username or email address

Forgot password
New to Daily Shell? Create an account
); } export default Singin;
